bibl.title: Cleomenes of Naucratis, Heroonpolis, and the Revenue from Red Sea Trade under Alexander the Great.
bibl.note: Introduction. - I. Alexander's Organization of Egypt and Cleomenes' Appointment to Heroonpolis. - II. The Location of Heroonpolis and its Significance. - III. The Red Sea Canal. - IV. Custom Duties, Trade and Heroonpolis. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Collins Andrew W., Cleomenes of Naucratis, Heroonpolis, and the Revenue from Red Sea Trade under Alexander the Great.

Introduction. - I. Alexander's Organization of Egypt and Cleomenes' Appointment to Heroonpolis. - II. The Location of Heroonpolis and its Significance. - III. The Red Sea Canal. - IV. Custom Duties, Trade and Heroonpolis. - Conclusion.
